title: Dopp
description: Dopp is (Decentralization Opportunities), an anonymous job search and recruiting website. It different from traditional job search and recruiting apps in that it helps job seekers to get market-matched salary levels, and it also offers assisted interviewing, where job seekers can gain interviewing experience by communicating with current employees in advance.Dopp uses decentralized technology to solve the problem of asymmetry of information, and rewards contributors with the use of Dopp tokens.
